entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 70%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
